text: Millard Mitchell (August 14, 1903 - October 13, 1953) was an American actor. He is known for his roles in My Six Convicts and in A Foreign Affair. He won a Golden Globe Award in 1952. Mitchell was born on August 14, 1903 in Havana, Cuba to American parents. He was married to Peggy Gould until his death in 1953. Mitchell died on October 13, 1953 in Santa Monica, California from lung cancer, aged 50. ==Other websites== * * Category:1903 births Category:1953 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Actors from Havana
title: Millard Mitchell
